description: Basis for this digital painting is sourced from a pencil drawing in a book I made. All drawings are completely improvised based upon various gestures and motifs I enjoy working with. Much of my work is inspired by music. While I am of the opinion that there are no direct correlations between notes and colours I like to think that this work uses green as a key signature for its colour composition. Total amount of time spent on producing this work took about 12 hours.
collection_description: SuperRare makes it easy to create, sell, and collect rare digital art. SuperRare's smart contract platform allows artists to release limited-edition digital artwork tracked on the blockchain, making the pieces rare, verified, and collectible. Filter the crypto art world's best selling works by artist name, creation type, and year of birth on OpenSea.
